awardsHtml:
3 wins & 23 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2009 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Directing for a Comedy Series
James Bobin (For The Tough Brets (2009))
2009 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Original Music and Lyrics
James Bobin (composer/lyricist) - Bret McKenzie (composer/lyricist) - Jemaine Clement (composer/lyricist) (For the song "Carol Brown". For episode "Unnatural Love".)
2009 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Lead Actor in a Comedy Series
Jemaine Clement (For playing: "Jemaine".)
2009 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Comedy Series
Stu Smiley (executive producer) - James Bobin (executive producer) - Troy Miller (executive producer) - Jemaine Clement (executive producer) - Bret McKenzie (executive producer) - Tracey Baird (co-executive producer) - Anna Dokoza (producer)
2009 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Mixing for a Comedy or Drama Series (Half-Hour) And Animation
Alex Sullivan (production mixer) - Brian Riordan (re-recording mixer) (For episode "Unnatural Love".)

Bret McKenzie - Jemaine Clement
